Content.Text:
<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ah, Ms. <MYNAME>. Welcome. You wish to see
Master Amir?

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Very well. Please wait here a moment.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The master will see you now. Follow me
please.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Master Amir. Here is Ms. <MYNAME>.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Thank you Sanjay.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I hope you enjoy your conversation,
Ms. <MYNAME>.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Welcome, <MYNAME>. I'm happy to welcome
you into my home. Please, relax.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Of course, you're the one who built this
house! So I must thank you for that.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
There's actually something I've been
wanting to ask you, so you've timed your
visit perfectly.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
I know this a little sudden, but I've
got a younger sister. I'm planning on
sending her a present of some sort.
<PAGE>
Sanjay and I are quite incapable
of selecting a gift suited to a woman,
however.
<PAGE>
I thought you might be able to provide a
woman's perspective. That's what I
wanted to talk to you about.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
What kind of present do you think a
woman would like?
An ore pendant from town
Some stones from town

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Great idea! Sanjay and I would never
have thought that up. Perfect!

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
In which case, a pendant made from ore
I have mined myself in town would be
the best, wouldn't it?
<PAGE>
Right, I'll go and get mining!

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
What? You'll even tell me the best spot
to mine for gems?
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Sorry for all of the trouble. That's a
great help, because I don't know the 
mines very well yet. Thank you.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Can we get into the details immediately,
then? Where's the best place in town to
get some real nice stones?

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Look at the time. I'm sorry, I've kept
you talking for so long!
<PAGE>
It looks like I'll get a fantastic
present out of it for my sister, though.
Thank you, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
It was great fun talking with you.
Please come and see me again.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well <MYNAME>. Goodbye.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Please take care on your way home.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
S-Stones? You think she'd like some...
stones? That's it?

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
It my fault for asking, obviously. I'll
try and work it out on my own again.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Sanjay! Come up here!

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Pardon me. Is there anything you need?

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Our guest is leaving.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
So soon?

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>
That's right.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Then I shall see you to the entrance.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Master Amir appears to be in a bad mood,
but please don't think too much of it.
He will recover quickly.
<PAGE>
Well, Ms. <MYNAME>. Please take care on
your way home.
